textBeforeTable: Components 0008M CPT Code(s) For additional information on Prosigna visit www.aruplab.com/oncology/prosigna. Note Refer to report.   Interpretive Data     Reference Interval Ambient: Indefinitely; Refrigerated: Indefinitely; Frozen: Unacceptable   Stability Surgical pathology report required.   Remarks Specimens fixed/processed in alternative fixatives (alcohol, Prefer). Decalcified specimens. Needle core biopsy. Less than 10 percent tumor.   Unacceptable Conditions Room temperature or refrigerated. Ship in cooled container during summer months.   Storage/Transport Temperature Formalin fix (10 percent neutral buffered formalin) and paraffin embed excised tissue. Protect from excessive heat. Transport tissue block or 6 unstained 10-micron slides. (Min: 3 slides). Transport block(s) and/or slide(s) in a tissue
textAfterTable: * Component test codes cannot be used to order tests. The information provided here is not sufficient for interface builds; for a complete test mix, please click the sidebar link to access the Interface Map.
